title: Guitar Cover - 'Replica' by Sonata Arctica
description: I am learning to play the guitar and here's a cover of one of my favourite songs: 'Replica' by Sonata Arctica.

title: Guitar Cover - 'Follow Me' by Savatage
description: I am learning to play the guitar and here's a cover of one of my favourite songs: 'Follow Me' by Savatage.

title: Tips I use to breath away a panic attack
description: I can't always prevent panic attacks. When I feel like I'm drowning in fear, I use these breathing tools and tricks... and I feel just a little bit better ;) Disclaimer: This is not professional advice. If you are experiencing troublesome feelings or thoughts you may consider asking for professional help.

title: How to speak to a trans/intersex/non binary person
description: We trans/intersex/non binary deserve to be talked to in a way which is respectful with our reality (body, feelings, identity, etc.). However it is a quite plain need, some people fail to speak to us respectfully, and sometimes it's because a lack of knowledge. Watch this tutorial if you wanna learn how we would like to be treated.
interactioncommenttext: Thank you for the info, I hope I can do better from now on!

title: How videogames taught me to fight racism
description: Just some reflections about gaming, online friends and how the gaming community is (mainly) a very nice place. This video is meant for teen and young gamers but for their concerned parents and families too.
